full_summary:
High Risk Offender Accompaniment Contract
==============================
## Contract Summary

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) has a requirement to provide transportation and accompaniment services for high-risk offenders released from correctional institutions in British Columbia. The contract will cover a period of 13 months, starting on March 1, 2024, with an option to extend for three additional 12-month periods.

## Scope of Work

The contractor must provide transportation services from the institution where the offender is being released to their designated community release destination within British Columbia. The services will involve:

* Ensuring a seamless transition of offenders from institutions to their community release destinations.
* Providing a backup resource to ensure continuity of services in case the contractor is unable to provide services due to vacation, illness, or other unforeseen circumstances.
* Maintaining accurate records of all accompaniments.

## Requirements and Constraints

* The contractor must have a valid driver's license and insurance for the duration of the contract.
* The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and have a reliability status for personnel requiring access to protected information.
* The contractor must not remove protected information or assets from designated sites.
* The contractor must comply with the provisions of the Security Requirements Checklist and Security Guide.
* The work must be performed in English.
* The contractor must have a minimum of one year of experience working with offenders in a community environment.

## Assessment Criteria

The contractor must demonstrate the following minimum essential requirements:

* One year of experience in security management for offenders in a correctional setting.
* One year of experience working directly with offenders in a community environment.
* Valid driver's license and clear driving abstract for the past five years.

## Evaluation Process

Interested suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities demonstrating how they meet the requirements outlined in the contract. Suppliers must clearly indicate why they are the best-suited contractor to perform the services.

## Contract Details

* Contract duration: 13 months, starting on March 1, 2024, with an option to extend for three additional 12-month periods.
* Estimated contract value: $242,697.50 (GST/HST extra).
